pages.text: In order to tackle the mysteries of $(thing)Aether$() and other spheres, we should first work on obtaining materials that will allow us to interact with alchemical substances and energies safely. Gold, as a noble metal, is mostly inert and us such can resist most substances, however it is also a very soft metal, that is vulnerable to physical stress.
To make gold usable, we need to reinforce it with additional Essentia, resulting in a metal that is both chemically inert like gold, and durable like metals commonly used in tool creation.
